thread.title: Architect of Jeremy Corbyn's economic policies turns down top Labour job

author: James Quinn
title: Architect of Jeremy Corbyn's economic policies turns down top Labour job
text: Economics Architect of Jeremy Corbyn's economic policies turns down top Labour job The man behind policies such as the 'people's QE' will not be working for the shadow Chancellor full time Richard Murphy has ruled out working for John McDonnell
